document.masterDocTitle: Revision of the Agrilus purpurifrons species-group (Coleoptera, Buprestidae, Agrilinae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of the Agrilus purpurifrons species-group (Coleoptera, Buprestidae, Agrilinae)

bibRefCitation.author: Kerremans, C.
bibRefCitation.refString: Kerremans, C. (1895) Buprestides Indo-Malais. Deuxieme partie. Annales de la Societe Entomologique de Belgique, 39, 192 - 224.

subSubSection.paragraph: Jendek 2016b : 33 ( lectotype designation; faunal records; Laos : Houaphan )

Type material.
Agrilus morio Kerremans, 1895
. Described from inexplicit number of specimens (ST). Type locality: “Kurseong”. Type specimens : Lectotype designated by Jendek (2016b) .

Agrilus lacroixi Obenberger, 1936
. Described from inexplicit number of specimens (ST). Type locality: “ Assam ”.
Type specimens:
Lectotype designated by Jendek (2005) .

Agrilus chapaensis
Descarpentries & Villiers, 1967
. Described from 1 specimen ( Holotype ). Type locality: “ Tonkin : Chapa”. Type specimens : Holotype ♂ (MNHN): “Chapa Tonkin H. Perrot [p] \ Agrilus chapaensis n. sp. nob.
Distribution. BHUTAN ; INDIA : Assam , Meghalaya , West Bengal ; LAOS : Houaphan ; THAILAND : Chiang Mai ; VIETNAM : Lao Cai , Vinh Phuc .

Remarks . The type examination revealed conspecificity of
A. morio
,
A. lacroixi
and
A. chapaensis
.
Agrilus morio
and
A. rousselatae
are homomorphic species dorsally differing only by presence/absence of pubescent topmost part of elytral apices (see key to species). From ventral view, the male of
A. rousselatae
differs in having small cluster of setae on inner margin of metacoxal plates.

The record of
A. morio
under synonymic name
A. lacroixi
from Vietnam ( Bac Giang province ) published by Jendek & Nakládal 2019 is a misidentification of
A. rousselatae Baudon, 1968
. Therefore Bac Giang is removed from the range of
A. morio
.
